ctx: intros P derivable_subset_preserved Phi Psi incl_Phi_Psi P_Psi.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma P : context -> Prop derivable_subset_preserved : CanonicalProperties.derivable_subset_preserved P Phi, Psi : Ensemble expr incl_Phi_Psi : Included expr Phi Psi P_Psi : P Psi The term "P" has type "context -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "context" (cannot unify "expr" and "context").

original: intros P derivable_subset_preserved Phi Psi incl_Phi_Psi P_Psi. apply (derivable_subset_preserved P derivable_subset_preserved Psi Phi). - intros x derivable_Psi_x. apply (incl_Phi_Psi x derivable_Psi_x). - apply P_Psi.
